src_original: ye śrāvakā ātmahitāya yuktā yogaṃ ca ye pravrajitāś caranti /
tgt_original: 亦為成熟眾，　　捨離於自事。

src_original: 3 yaṃ sevamānāmiṣasaṃgraho bhaved bhaven na dharmasya ca saṃgraho yahim* 2 tān bodhisatvāś caturo  4 prahāya kalyāṇamitrāś caturo bhajanti /
tgt_original: 此是四種真實菩薩。 親近善知識，　　所謂法師佛，

src_original: ete kumitrā kusahāya-y-uktā jinena dūrāt parivarjanīyā / 3 //
tgt_original: 勸勵出家者，　　及以乞求輩。
此四種菩薩善知識，應當親近。

src_original: yācanako bodhisatvasya  1 bhūtakalyāṇamitraṃ bodhimārgopastaṃbhāya saṃvartate dharmabhāṇako bodhisatvasya bhūtakalyāṇamitraṃ  2 śrutaprajñopastaṃbhāya saṃvartate /
tgt_original: 所謂法師是菩薩善知識，為助持聞慧故。 佛世尊是菩薩善知識，為助持諸佛法故。

src_original: pravrajyāsamādapako bodhisatvasya bhūtakalyāṇamitra sarvakuśalamūlopastaṃbhāya  3 saṃvartate /  buddhā bhagavanto bodhisatvasya bhūtakalyāṇamitra sarvabuddhadharmopastaṃbhāya
tgt_original: 勸出家者是菩薩善知識，為助持諸善根故。

src_original: ime kāśyapa bodhisatvasya bhūtakalyāṇamitrāṇi tatredam ucyate / 12 //  kalyāṇamitraṃ  5 sa ca dāyakānāṃ pratigrāhako bodhiparigrahāya /
tgt_original: 乞求者是菩薩善知識，為助持菩提心故。 此四種菩薩善知識，應當親近。
此四種菩薩惡知識，應當知之。
